title: Smart Data models -SolarEnergy schema
description: A Data Model for Solar Energy generation.

totalActivePower.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Total active power consumed by all phases.

phaseCurrent.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Text. Current per phase. Ordered triple comprising of active power from three phases in the following order: [R Y B]

reactivePower.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Text. Reactive power consumed per phase. Ordered triple comprising of active power from three phases in the following order: [R Y B]

voltage.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'.The value of Voltage in the entity corresponding to this observation.

powerFactor.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'.Power factor or the ratio of working power of the entity corresponding to this observation.

current.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. The value of Current in the entity corresponding to this observation.

phaseVoltage.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Text. Voltage per phase. Ordered triple comprising of active power from three phases in the following order: [R Y B]

totalReactivePower.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Total reactive power for all phases.

activePower.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Text. Active power consumed per phase. Ordered triple comprising of active power from three phases in the following order: [R Y B]

energyGenerated.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Energy generated over a specific time range from the energy resource corresponding to this observation.

maxSolarPowerMeasure.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. A measure of maximum solar energy that can be generated.

frequency.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Frequency observed from the entity corresponding to this observation.

totalEnergyGenerated.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Total energy generated by the energy resource corresponding to this observation.

observationDateTime.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Text'. Last reported time of observation.
